mapper.select: SELECT `no`, seq, usedDate, summary, usedPlace, price, note, memberId, registeredDate, modifiedDate FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS `no`, seq, usedDate, summary, usedPlace, price, note, memberId, registeredDate, modifiedDate FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 AS `no`) R, ( SELECT seq, usedDate, summary, usedPlace, price, note, memberId, DATE_FORMAT(registeredDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS registeredDate, DATE_FORMAT(modifiedDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modifiedDate FROM oms_person_moneybook WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND usedDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY ${sort} ${order} ) T ) T1 WHERE `no` BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `oms_person_moneybook` ( `seq`, `usedDate`, `summary`, `usedPlace`, `price`, `note`, `memberId`, `registeredDate`, `modifiedDate` ) VALUES ( IF((SELECT MAX(seq) FROM oms_person_moneybook t) IS NULL, 0, (SELECT MAX(seq) + 1 FROM oms_person_moneybook t1) ), #{usedDate}, #{summary}, #{usedPlace}, #{price}, #{note}, #{memberId}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE `oms_person_moneybook` SET usedDate = #{usedDate}, summary = #{summary}, price = #{price}, note = #{note}, modifiedDate = SYSDATE() WHERE seq = #{seq} AND memberId = #{memberId}
